Title: Cloak and Needle
Description: Once you don your cloak, you will be able to find threads on any enemy. The cloak will naturally absorb those threads, permanently increasing your power. Try collecting a thread from the nearby Infinite Ravagers.
ObjectivesText: Equip your Cloak of Infinite Potential and collect a Thread of Power from an Infinite Ravager.
RewardText: You will find similar threads everywhere, from slain foes to looted treasures.

Objectives.Text: Thread of Power collected from Infinite Ravager
